annotations: This heavyweight, water-repellent hooded sweatshirt has a zip front for fast layering. ORIGINAL FIT. 13 oz., 75% cotton/25% polyester blend with Rain Defender durable water repellent. Attached, jersey-lined three-piece hood with drawcord closure. Antique-finish brass front zipper. Two front hand-warmer pockets have a hidden security pocket inside. Stretchable, spandex-reinforced rib-knit cuffs and waistband. Locker loop facilitates hanging.
